sections.heading: of Adult Services; duties.The Division of Adult Services shall:(1) Establish, administer, and supervise all correctional facilities designed to house adult offenders;(2) Establish and maintain the Adult Diagnostic and Evaluation Services Program;(3) Develop and coordinate with the assistance of the
sections.text: of Adult Services; duties.The Division of Adult Services shall:(1) Establish, administer, and supervise all correctional facilities designed to house adult offenders;(2) Establish and maintain the Adult Diagnostic and Evaluation Services Program;(3) Develop and coordinate with the assistance of the Division of Community-Centered Services, volunteer programs within adult correctional facilities; and(4) Perform any other duties assigned by the Director of Correctional Services.SourceLaws 1975, LB 417, ยง 16;Laws 1986, LB 481, ยง 2;Laws 1993, LB 31, ยง 81.
